LanguageData.VV_PlantGatherCooldownInspectorString: Time remaining until the next gather is possible: {0}
LanguageData.VV_GizmoViviEggProgressTooltip: Indicates how much time is left until the next egg is laid.\n\nIf the progress is at 100% and there is a suitable Vivi hatchery for laying, it will go there to lay an egg.
LanguageData.VV_CommandFertilizeAutoActivatedDesc: When the plant's mana is below a certain level, the colonists set whether to automatically use fertilizer.
LanguageData.VV_CommandSetFertilizeAutoThresholdDesc: Set the threshold mana to determine whether to use fertilizer. If the mana is below the threshold, the colonists use fertilizer to the maximum.
LanguageData.VV_CommandCancelReserveWeaponDesc: Cancel the currently scheduled or ongoing arming operation.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_Mana_Desc: This is the maximum amount of mana that plants can store.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFlux_Desc: This is the amount of mana change of this plant over the course of a day. \Mana can be produced by certain arcane plants when fertilizer is applied or the right environment is in place, and is not consumed when packaged. \nArcane plants whose mana production exceeds their reserves provide excess mana to other arcane plants in the immediate vicinity.
